tasks.title: Set up Project Structure and Dependencies
tasks.description: Create a new React project with the necessary dependencies for the frontend, backend, and mobile applications.
tasks.details: npm init, npm install react react-dom framer-motion material-ui react-leaflet chart.js emailjs
tasks.testStrategy: Unit testing using Jest and Enzyme

tasks.title: Implement User Management Module (A. Użytkownicy)
tasks.description: Create a user management module with login, registration, and role-based access control.

tasks.title: Develop Client Module (B. Klienci)
tasks.description: Create a client module with CRUD operations for clients, including personal and medical data.
tasks.testStrategy: Unit testing using Jest and Enzyme

tasks.title: Implement Calendar Module (C. Kalendarz)
tasks.description: Create a calendar module with scheduling, event management, and integration with Google Calendar.

tasks.title: Develop Dashboard Module (D. Dashboard)
tasks.description: Create a dashboard module with statistics, upcoming appointments, and customizable widgets.
tasks.testStrategy: Unit testing using Jest and Enzyme

tasks.title: Implement Newsletter Module (E. Newsletter)
tasks.description: Create a newsletter module with email sending, subscription management, and analytics.

tasks.title: Develop System Motywy Module (F. System motywów)
tasks.description: Create a system motif module with light and dark themes, customizable colors, and logo support.
tasks.testStrategy: Unit testing using Jest and Enzyme

tasks.title: Implement Gallery Module (G. Galeria)
tasks.description: Create a gallery module with advanced features, including map integration, timeline, and drag-and-drop upload.

tasks.title: Develop Treatment Module (H. Zarządzanie zabiegami)
tasks.description: Create a treatment module with treatment planning, notes, and photos.
tasks.testStrategy: Unit testing using Jest and Enzyme

tasks.title: Implement Analytics Module (I. Analityka)
tasks.description: Create an analytics module with reporting, exporting to PDF/Excel, and advanced filtering.
